type: TS LF Learning Bot Error - Evaluating Formula Error

definition.text: An error occured while evaluatiing a user-defined Formula at the Learning System.

paragraphs.text: While running at the TS, the LF Learning Bot encountered an error trying to evaluate one of the formulas defined in the Learning System. Formulas are arbitrary Javascript Code that users may write. The code must be valid Javascript for Node JS.
In the following section, you will find the information recorded when the error occurred.
You will only see the information if you opened this page as a result of the error actually occurring.
